bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
The Kubernetes manual pages aren't built. Instead of the expected content, they contain:
This file is autogenerated, but we’ve stopped checking such files into the repository to reduce the need for rebases. Please run hack/generate‐docs.sh to populate this file.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
1.4.7-1
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. sudo dnf install kubernetes-client 2. man kubectl
Actual results:
This file is autogenerated, but we’ve stopped checking such files into the repository to reduce the need for rebases. Please run hack/generate‐docs.sh to populate this file.
Expected results:
The actual manual page should be displayed.
Additional info:
kubernetes-1.5.1-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-6ae65d21bd

kubernetes-1.5.1-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-6ae65d21bd
kubernetes-1.5.2-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-74d98bce50

kubernetes-1.5.2-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-74d98bce50
kubernetes-1.5.2-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
